vernac_cmds: Inductive transition (c : Config) : Set := | decrement : (co c > 0)%Z -> Zeven.Zodd (co c) -> transition c | divide : (co c > 0)%Z -> Zeven.Zeven (co c) -> transition c.
Definition next_config (c : Config) (t : transition c) := match t with | decrement h1 h2 => decrement_trans c | divide h1 h2 => divide_trans c end.
Inductive legal : Config -> Prop := | begin : legal (mk_init_config x) | after : forall (c : Config) (t : transition c), legal c -> legal (next_config c t).
Lemma Zdiv2_positive : forall x : Z, Zeven.Zeven x -> (x >= 0)%Z -> (Zeven.Zdiv2 x >= 0)%Z.
Lemma x_gt_Zdiv2 : forall x : Z, Zeven.Zeven x -> (x > 0)%Z -> (x > Zeven.Zdiv2 x)%Z.
Lemma counter_remains_positive_or_null : forall (x : Z) (c : Config), (x >= 0)%Z -> legal x c -> (co c >= 0)%Z.
Lemma decreasing_measure : forall (c : Config) (t : transition c), (co c > co (next_config c t))%Z.
Lemma liveness : forall (x : Z) (c : Config), legal x c -> (co c > 0)%Z -> exists t : transition c, legal x (next_config c t).
Lemma blocked : forall c : Config, (co c <= 0)%Z -> ~ (exists t : transition c, True).
Lemma recur2 : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, (forall p : nat, p < n -> P p) -> P n) -> forall m : nat, P m.
intro; rewrite e; apply H; auto.
Lemma natgen_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, (forall x : Z, (0 <= x)%Z -> (forall y : Z, (0 <= y)%Z -> (y < x)%Z -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : Z, (0 <= x)%Z -> P x.
intro; apply recur2 with (P := fun n : nat => P (Z_of_nat n)).
intro; intro; apply Z_of_nat_prop with (P := fun y : Z => (y < Z_of_nat n0)%Z -> P y).

Lemma rec2_princ : forall P : Z -> Prop, P 0%Z -> (forall x : Z, Zeven.Zeven x -> (x > 0)%Z -> P (Zeven.Zdiv2 x) -> P x) -> (forall x : Z, Zeven.Zodd x -> (x > 0)%Z -> P (x - 1)%Z -> P x) -> forall x : Z, (x >= 0)%Z -> P x.
apply Zge_le; apply Zdiv2_positive; [ trivial | omega ].
apply Zgt_lt; apply x_gt_Zdiv2; [ trivial | omega ].
Lemma legal_x_x : forall x : Z, legal x (mkconfig x).
intro; generalize (begin x); unfold mk_init_config in |- *; trivial.
Lemma simpl_config : forall c : Config, mkconfig (co c) = c.
Lemma legal_trans : forall (x : Z) (c c' : Config), legal x c -> legal (co c) c' -> legal x c'.
unfold mk_init_config in |- *; rewrite simpl_config; trivial.
Lemma legal_decrement : forall (x : Z) (c : Config), (x > 0)%Z -> Zeven.Zodd x -> legal (x - 1) c -> legal x c.
intros; apply legal_trans with (c := decrement_trans (mkconfig x)).
intro; replace (decrement_trans (mkconfig x)) with (next_config (mkconfig x) (decrement (mkconfig x) H2 H3)).
Lemma legal_divide : forall (x : Z) (c : Config), (x > 0)%Z -> Zeven.Zeven x -> legal (Zeven.Zdiv2 x) c -> legal x c.
intros; apply legal_trans with (c := divide_trans (mkconfig x)).
intro; replace (divide_trans (mkconfig x)) with (next_config (mkconfig x) (divide (mkconfig x) H2 H3)).
Lemma fin_O : forall x : Z, (x >= 0)%Z -> legal x (mkconfig 0%Z).
intros; apply rec2_princ with (P := fun x : Z => legal x (mkconfig 0%Z)).
Lemma termination : forall x : Z, exists c : Config, legal x c /\ ~ (exists t : transition c, True).
apply blocked; simpl in |- *; auto with zarith.

command: intro; rewrite e; apply H; auto.
intro; apply recur2 with (P := fun n : nat => P (Z_of_nat n)).
intro; intro; apply Z_of_nat_prop with (P := fun y : Z => (y < Z_of_nat n0)%Z -> P y).
apply Zge_le; apply Zdiv2_positive; [ trivial | omega ].
apply Zgt_lt; apply x_gt_Zdiv2; [ trivial | omega ].
intro; generalize (begin x); unfold mk_init_config in |- *; trivial.
unfold mk_init_config in |- *; rewrite simpl_config; trivial.
intros; apply legal_trans with (c := decrement_trans (mkconfig x)).
intro; replace (decrement_trans (mkconfig x)) with (next_config (mkconfig x) (decrement (mkconfig x) H2 H3)).
intros; apply legal_trans with (c := divide_trans (mkconfig x)).
intro; replace (divide_trans (mkconfig x)) with (next_config (mkconfig x) (divide (mkconfig x) H2 H3)).
intros; apply rec2_princ with (P := fun x : Z => legal x (mkconfig 0%Z)).
apply blocked; simpl in |- *; auto with zarith.
